title: Turtix 2: Rescue Adventures
text:
Turtix 2: Rescue Adventures Help a heroic turtle navigate three gorgeous game worlds dripping with detail. User rating: 2 (100%) 0 (0%) 1 comment 
Turtix 2: Rescue Adventures is available as a Giveaway of the day! You have limited time to download and install it. Download Now Turtix 2: Rescue Adventures Terms and conditions 
Exclusive offer from Giveaway of the Day and MyPlayCity! No third-party advertising and browser add-ons! 
Help a heroic turtle navigate three gorgeous game worlds dripping with detail. Block the bad guys on their mission to capture toddler turtles in this side-scrolling Arcade game. Use your brain to eliminate traps and obstacles while crushing dozens of enemies with crates. Navigate 60 wondrous worlds with loads of puzzles while collecting bonuses and power-ups. Can you recover the baby turtles in Turtix 2 Rescue Adventure? Tons of puzzles; Rescue young turtles! System Requirements: 
Windows XP/ Vista/ 7/ 8/ 10; CPU: 800 Mhz; RAM: 512 MB; DirectX: 8.1; Hard Drive: 37 MB Publisher:
